author: Ulises Freitas<ulises.freitas@gmail.com>
description:
Choose from list of given string of values and return one of the randomly
#How to use it
Create a new variable of the type you want Number/String then go to Functions and select Choose::RandomString or Choose::RandomNumber and set the values you want to randomize separated by commas.
Done.
fullName: Choose from list of given string of values and return one of the randomly
name: Choose
shortDescription: Choose a random value given a list of them

eventsFunctions.description: Choose a random value between these strings
eventsFunctions.name: RandomString

parameters.description: Write the string you want to randomize separated by commas
parameters.name: ChooseString

eventsFunctions.description: Choose a random value between these numbers
eventsFunctions.name: RandomNumber

parameters.description: Write the numbers you want to randomize separated by commas
parameters.name: ChoosedNumbersString
